translated: Jātaka Stories🔽The Three-Facultied One🔽The Chapter about Thoughts
this one with a bald head and wrinkles;
Whatever is done, he spoils it,
this family has such a nature.
This is not the hair of a man of mind,
this is not the hair of a deer;
I’ve been taught by the people’s assembly,
nor brother nor sister nor one’s own;
Such a man would support them,
The Birth Story of Gāmaṇi-canda is the seventh.
